name: bitwarden
title: Search Bitwarden Vault Items
description: Access your Bitwarden vault from Raycast. Requires installing the Bitwarden CLI separately.
author: pomdtr

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Vault Items
commands.subtitle: Bitwarden
commands.description: Search all items in the authenticated Bitwarden vault.

preferences.name: clientId
preferences.title: Client ID
preferences.description:
The client_id value seen in the My Account section of a Bitwarden web vault. More info:
https://bitwarden.com/help/article/personal-api-key/

preferences.name: clientSecret
preferences.title: Client Secret
preferences.description:
The client_secret value seen in the My Account section of a Bitwarden web vault. More info:
https://bitwarden.com/help/article/personal-api-key/

preferences.name: cliPath
preferences.title: Bitwarden CLI Installation Path
preferences.description: Location of the local Bitwarden CLI installation. Defaults to '/usr/local/bin/bw'.

preferences.name: fetchFavicons
preferences.title: Privacy
preferences.label: Fetch vaut items icons.
preferences.description: This causes additional networks calls to a service owned by Google.
